issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr.20 Gap Problem (left side)
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between between accessions BX640513.2 and AL450469.11. A gap extension from the left hand side is being considered for a patch release.
issue.resolution_text: An extension from the left side of this gap was released as a FIX patch: GL582979.1. This patch provides additional sequence for the gap located between components BX640513.2 and AL450469.11 in reference chromosome NC_000020.10. There is another ticket describing a FIX patch that extends into this gap from the right side in HG-1411.

issue.status_text: We will attempt PCR to determine if this sequence should be present in the Reference.
issue.description: Alignments of YH1 and HuRef to GRCh37 indicate there may be sequence related to this region of Chr. 20 that is missing from GRCh37.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Possible assembly error or missing sequence from reference component AL121753.30 that affects MMP24 (GeneID: 10893)
issue.resolution_text: Component AL121753 has been updated and now contains the missing exon.

issue.description: There is a gap between AL645732 and FP929141.
issue.resolution_text: There is alignment between AL645732 and AL360078, so the gap no longer exists.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC207480.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383577.1 created to capture sequence from AC207480.4 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383577.1 created to capture sequence from AC207480.4 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.summary: Unlocalized scaffold assigned to chromosome 9 may actually map to chr20.
issue.description: Unlocalized scaffold GL000198.1 is currently unlocalized on chr9, but new evidence suggests that it may map to chr20.
issue.resolution_text: The issue reported in this ticket is identical to the one reported in HG-662. This ticket will be resolved and all future work on this issue will be recorded in HG-662.

issue.description: The genome region lacks the decapeptide repeat observed in the canine ortholog. Misc_feat annotation in AL132765.38:104908..106170 indicates 500 bp missing, corresponding to a 28 tandem repeat and a portion of AB037819.2, which contains the longest repeat length.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr.20 Gap Problem (right side)
issue.description: There is an assembly gap between between accessions BX640513.2 and AL450469.11. Gap extensions since GRCh37 are being considered for a patch release.
issue.resolution_text: An extension from the right side of this gap was released as a FIX patch: GL582978.1. This patch provides additional sequence for the gap located between components BX640513.2 and AL450469.11 in reference chromosome NC_000020.10.

issue.description: There is a gap in build 36 between AL512784.6 and AL450465.12. nts 1-133 of NM_014902.3 are GC rich; BLAST with no filter indicates these align at 100% to AL512784.6 whereas the remainder of NM_014902.3 aligns to the components of NT_011362.9, of which AL450465.12 is the first one across the gap.
issue.resolution_text: The PCR product JN854134.1 was used to bridge the gap between FP565784.3 and FP565581.3.

issue.status_text: 15-MAY-13: CH17-326K24 has been selected for sequencing Accession for CH17-326K24: FO082860
issue.description:
The GRCh37 component AL358116.7 is missing euchromatic sequence on the p-arm side of the centromere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until centromeric repeats are identified.
New sequence has been added extending into this gap from AL358116.7 AL358116.7 AUXG01000470.1 GAP AUXG01000469.1 GAP AUXG01000468.1 GAP AUXG01000467.1
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description:
The GRCh37 component AL121762.13 is missing euchromatic sequence on the q-arm side of the centromere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until centromeric repeats are identified.
new sequence FP565326.9 has been added extending into this gap from AL121762.13
issue.resolution_text: FP565326.9 contains ~70kb of centromeric repeat the gap between this clone and the centromere has been removed

issue.status_text: 09-SEP-14: CH17-294F12 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for CH17-294F12: FO681521
issue.description:
Assembly gap between AL441988.11 (RP11-348I14) and FP565421.3 (ABC8-2141940I11)
New sequence has been added extending into this gap for GRCh38
AL441988.11 ABBA01015426.1 GAP AC018688.9 AC092107.5 GAP AC104301.2 GAP FO681521.2 GAP AUXG01000201.1 GAP AUXG01000202.1 FP565421.3
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Chr. 20 missing segmental duplication found on chr. 2
issue.status_text: In GRCh38, the following components have been added to the distal peri-centromeric region of chr. 20 to provide representation for a segmental duplication associated with chr.2: AC018688.9 (RP11-462H3), AC092107.5 (RP11-755J8), AC104301.2 (RP11-150N22). Another component associated with this duplication, AC011850.12 (RP11-364J18), has been placed within the centromere. We continue to review this region as the clone placements may require refinement.
issue.description: GRCh37 chr. 20 is missing a copy of a segmental duplication also found on chr. 2.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Possibly get AL049541.24 checked again to finish tandem repeat. If not then will insert AC209236.4 as a contained clone.
issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion within AL049541.24
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: In chromosome 20 accession FO393401 currently has the clone-name RP3-477O4, whereas it should have RP11-563A22.
issue.resolution_text: RP11-563A22 now has the correct accession, FO393401.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC231535.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly
issue.description: Non-component AC231535.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals an alignment to AL109911.47 which is on chromosome 20. AC231535.2 contains sequence not present on the reference assembly and so will be added to an alternative haplotype tile path.
issue.resolution_text: Non-component AC231535.2 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. BLASTing it reveals an alignment to AL109911.47 which is on chromosome 20. AC231535.2 contains sequence not present on the reference assembly and so will be added to an alternative haplotype tile path.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226131.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.description: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC226131.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference Assembly
issue.resolution_text: BLASTed AC226131.3 and it appears to be contained within AL121581.41. This has been added to the alternate tile path (ALT_1).

issue.summary: Non-component AC210433.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.description: Non-component AC210433.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly
issue.resolution_text: Non-component AC210433.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the GRCh37.p10 assembly. This component has since been added to the alternate tile path so that the sequence is represented.

issue.summary: User reported a gap in JN854134.1
issue.description: There is a gap in PCR product JN854134.1; annotated as a feature on the sequence record.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL121781.38
issue.status_text: Based on RP11 whole genome shotgun and optical map data this looks like a deletion in the clone AL121781.38
issue.description: Analysis of GU267780.1 and GU266876.1 along with alignment of HuRef chr. 20, suggest there may be ~4,808 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL121781.38. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL035249.6
issue.status_text: Based on RP11 whole genome shotgun, optical map and other available sequence this looks to be variation
issue.description: Analysis of GU269121.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 20, suggest there may be ~2,846 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL035249.6. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL117333.26
issue.status_text: Due to RP11 whole genome shotgun reads suggesting this is possibly variation this will be investigated further.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268429.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 20, suggest there may be ~5,052 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL117333.26. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL034419.22
issue.status_text: Based on optical mapping and RP11 whole genome shotgun this could be a clone problem
issue.description: Analysis of GU267691.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 20, suggest there may be ~1,777 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL034419.22. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in chromosome 20 between components AC092107.5 and AC104301.2
issue.status_text: The region will be investigated to locate sequence that closes the gap
issue.description: There is a gap in chromosome 20 between components AC092107.5 and AC104301.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: There is a gap in chromosome 20 between components AC104301.2 and FO681521.2
issue.status_text: This gap will be assessed to locate sequence that covers the region
issue.description: There is a gap in chromosome 20 between components AC104301.2 and FO681521.2
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AL049541.25 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL049541.25 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The accession version update has no effect on the alignments

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_017495.4 (RBM38) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: The assembly component in question, AL109955 had an accession version update from Build 36 to GRCh37 (AL109955.37 to AL109955.38). This resolved the 1 nucleotide deletion which affected the protein translation, as mentioned in this issue's description. The mismatches between the GRCh37 and the RefSeq data in the 5'UTR of gene RBM38 were investigated by looking at the sequence traces, and the data supported the reference genome.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_018474.3 (C20orf19) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF459716.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 20 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 55857 (C20orf19) in GRCh38.

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_020882.2 (COL20A1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Sequence change from Build 36 to GRCh37. AL121827.33 was replaced with AL121827.34, removing the deletion that caused the frameshift

issue.description: There is a possible functional difference between the proteins encoded by RefSeq NM_024663.3 (NPEPL1) and the genomic region to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Sequence change from Build 36 to GRCh37. AL139349.36 was replaced with AL139349.37, removing the insertion that caused the frameshift

issue.description: There is a sequence discrepancy between RefSeq NM_033089.6 (ZCCHC3) and the reference genomic sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: Minicontig KF495703.1 has been generated and added to the Chr. 20 Reference to update the base to the more common allele to improve representation of GeneID: 85364 (ZCCHC3) in GRCh38.

issue.status_text: The RefSeq may represent genuine variation. I will change the status to SAB decision until further information as to how to proceed comes to light.
issue.description: There is a sequency discrepancy between RefSeq NM_152503.4 (C20orf132) and the reference genome sequence to which it aligns.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: 02-JUL-13: ABC14-50077400H20 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 Accession for ABC14-50077400H20: FO704554
issue.description:
The GRCh37 component AL645732.1 is missing euchromatic sequence leading into the telomere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until telomeric repeats are identified.
New sequence has been added extending into this gap for GRCh38 from AL645732.1 AL645732.1 FO704554.1, ABBA01053738.1 GAP AEKP01151425.1 GAP AEKP01151426.1 GAP
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL358116.7 and AL121762.13.
issue.resolution_text: The flanking accessions of this region have changed. This issue will be resolved and new tickets opened to deal with the gaps in this region.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL441988.11 and AL121723.36.
issue.resolution_text: The accessions for this ticket have changed. It will now be tracked in ticket HG-1526.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL499627.23 and AL449263.6.
issue.resolution_text: The gap between AL499627.23 and AL449263.6 has been closed by the incorporation of AC161429 into the TPF. This patch closes the gap located between components AL499627.23 and AL449263.6 in reference chromosome NC_000020.10.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX640514.2 and AL450469.11
issue.resolution_text: The PCR product JN854136.1 was used to bridge the gap between AC174062.1 and FP565323.3.

issue.status_text: WI2-1013D9_selected_for_sequencing 2012_06_28: WI2-1013D9 has completed sequence production and a draft assembly has been submitted Accession for WI2-1013D9: FO082808 WI2-1013D9 has been cancelled 17-DEC-14: ABC9-41279100E15 has entered the sequencing pipeline
issue.description: The GRCh37 component AL137028.9 is missing euchromatic sequence leading into the telomere. Clones will be selected to extend from this component until telomeric repeats are identified.

issue.summary: Should unplaced contig NT_113914 be retained in the assembly?
issue.status_text: At present there is no further information to assist with the placement of this contig.
issue.description: Determine evidence for keeping NT_113914 as an unplaced contig in the assembly.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains an insertion between AL049634.8 and AL138804.16
issue.resolution_text: Optical mapping shows that this region of the genome exhibits variation,there is no problem with the current representation of this region

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP11-503P21 to be removed from the TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP11-503P21 to be removed from the TPF
issue.resolution_text: In order to remove split finish clone RP11-503P21 from the TPF, CR383702.1 (RP11-503P21_B) was removed and replaced with fosmid WI2-3344O2.

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP1-29M10 to be removed from TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP1-29M10 to be removed from TPF
issue.resolution_text: AL022342 inserted into TPF in place of AL390211, AL049540, AL390212

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP13-218F6 to be removed from TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP13-218F6 to be removed from TPF
issue.resolution_text: AL391095 inserted into TPF in place of AL391692, AL080249, AL391693

issue.summary: Split finish clone RP11-563A22 to be removed from TPF
issue.description: Split finish clone RP11-563A22 to be removed from TPF
issue.resolution_text: RP11-563A22 (FO393401.1) inserted in place of the three components. RP11-563A22 is now represented correctly in the TPF.

issue.description: Alignment to HuRef suggests that AL160413.7 (RP5-837G17) may be missing ~40 kb of sequence.
issue.resolution_text: No evidence of misassembly. No optical map data to support an alternate haplotype within the insertion. However since the insertion conatins decoy sequence ABC8-714822F8 (AC232301.2) and ABC7-42749900J23 (AC232307.2) were added to the TPF (contained within AL160413.7) as an fix patch.
